oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CORE Organic country report. Preliminary report on Danish research in organic food and farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Andreasen, Information manager Claus Bo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Knowledge management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of the country report is to present an overview of Danish research in organic food and farming. The overview includes descriptions of History, Organisation , Research programmes, Financing, Research facilities, Initiation of research and stakeholder engagement, Selection criteria and evaluation procedures, Utilisation of research, Scientific education & research schools
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Andreasen, Information manager Claus Bo (2005) CORE Organic country report. Preliminary report on Danish research in organic food and farming. Working paper, Danish Research Centre for Organic Food and Farming (DARCOF). [Unpublished]
